alert.note: Alert for Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tippah and northeastern Benton Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gravestown, or 9 miles northwest of Ripley, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Snow Lake Shores, Gravestown, Walnut, Ashland, Falkner, Murry, Brody, Spring Hill, Whitten Town, Pine Grove, Hamilton, Peoples, Bethel and Tiplersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
